name: Duels of the Planeswalkers Gold Deck Bundle
name_original: Duels of the Planeswalkers Gold Deck Bundle
description:
Magic the Gathering: Duels of the Planeswalkers: Gold - Deck Bundle contains 17 Deck Unlocks and 17 Foil Conversions!

17 Deck Unlocks
  • Claws of Vengeance Deck Unlock
  • Cries of Rage Deck Unlock
  • Ears of the Elves Deck Unlock
  • Eons of Evil Deck Unlock
  • Eyes of Shadow Deck Unlock
  • Hands of Flame Deck Unlock
  • Heart of the Worlds Deck Unlock
  • Heat of Battle Deck Unlock
  • Master of Shadows Deck Unlock
  • Mind of Void Deck Unlock
  • Relics of Doom Deck Unlock
  • Root of the Firemind Deck Unlock
  • Scales of Fury Deck Unlock
  • Teeth of the Predator Deck Unlock
  • Thoughts of Wind Deck Unlock
  • Weapons of Warrior Deck Unlock
  • Wings of Light Deck Unlock
17 Deck Foil Conversions
  • Claws of Vengeance Foil Conversion
  • Cries of Rage Foil Conversion
  • Ears of the Elves Foil Conversion
  • Eons of Evil Foil Conversion
  • Eyes of Shadow Foil Conversion
  • Hands of Flame Foil Conversion
  • Heart of the Worlds Foil Conversion
  • Heat of Battle Foil Conversion
  • Master of Shadows Foil Conversion
  • Mind of Void Foil Conversion
  • Relics of Doom Foil Conversion
  • Root of the Firemind Foil Conversion
  • Scales of Fury Foil Conversion
  • Teeth of the Predator Foil Conversion
  • Thoughts of Wind Foil Conversion
  • Weapons of Warrior Foil Conversion
  • Wings of Light Foil Conversion
